          <title>
            <string language="en">Active site of an enzyme</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Aktive Site eines Enzyms</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Site actif d'une enzyme</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Local ativo de um enzyme</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Luogo attivo di un enzima</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ενεργός περιοχή ενός ενζύμου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Sitio activo de una enzima</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows how an enzyme breaks down a substrate molecule in the active site of the enzyme.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">active site</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">catalysis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">enzyme</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">enzyme-substrate complex</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">substrate molecule</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, wie ein Enzym hinunter ein
Substratmolekül in der aktiven Site des Enzyms bricht.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre comment une enzyme 
décompose une molécule de substrat dans le site actif de l'enzyme.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra como um enzyme quebra 
abaixo uma molécula da carcaça no local ativo do enzyme.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra come un enzima 
analizza una molecola del substrato nel luogo attivo dell'enzima.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση επιδεικνύει πώς ένα ένζυμο 
χωρίζει ένα μόριο υποστρωμάτων στην ενεργό περιοχή του ενζύμου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra cómo una enzima analiza
una molécula del substrato en el sitio activo de la enzima.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-de">aktive Site</string>
          </keyword>
